DESCRIPTIONS: Will not take damage. NL
Mechanical Heart NL Play: Gain ash-like shine.

Self-Destructive Factor NL Play: Reduce the opponent's max HP by 5 (minimum of 1).
Rebirth of a Maiden NL Play: Clear one of the opponent's positive states, restore 50 HP.
Falling Maiden NL Play: End your turn.
Falling Maiden NL Play: Deal 4 times 5 damage.

turns: Lifted by entering the preparation performance with a skill rhythm through skill cards. NL When the countdown ends, bestow the blessing of Star Trails upon Anon: For each card the opponent plays, they lose 1 HP.

turns: Lifted when filling the live gauge 3 times in one turn. NL When the countdown ends, bestow the blessing of the Self-Destructive Factor upon Anon: When you gain a status effect, clear them.

GirlsReboot.NAME: 《GirlsReboot》
DESCRIPTIONS: For each performance of 'The Triple Fugue of Void and Whiteness', gain 1 Strength and 1 Agility point; if your Gravity and Shimmer counts are unequal, there's a 50% chance that 'I Love You, What's It To You?' will draw one less card and a 50% chance to reduce costs one less time when played.

WorldLegacy.NAME: 《WorldLegacy》
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever the guitar performance '-Asakusa & Miru-' from 'The Triple Fugue of Void and Whiteness' triggers successfully, it removes all 'In Preparation' statuses; if all three Revues have been performed, each time you gain a Performance Readiness, you can foresee 5 steps ahead.

WhiteMythology.NAME: 《WhiteMythology》
DESCRIPTIONS: ach performance of 'The Triple Fugue of Void and Whiteness' imposes 2 layers of Gravity and 4 layers of Bind on all enemies and allies on the field; when 'Destroy You, What's It To You?' is performed, no Artifacts are acquired.
